item.title: stepper and biss-c
item.description: setup EL7041 stepper drive slave EL5042 BISS-C encoder slave Lab test stage (1mm/rev) Lab 4 axis motion control box RLS BISS-C linear encoder (absolute) Open loop encoder (incremental) scalings Config for scaling in mm, mm/s, mm/s2 encoder scalings Two encoders are configured: Closed loop: BISS-C. This is used as the default encoder for control Open loop: EL7041 Step counter Both these encoders (and drive) should be scaled to the same unit (mm).
